message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this amazing product with you! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $800000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $750000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with my budget.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I still believe the product's value to you is higher than $750000. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $850000. I think this is a fair price considering the benefits you'll gain from owning this product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I've considered your proposal and would like to make a counteroffer of $800000 for the product. I hope this offers a fair compromise for both of us.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I'm willing to consider your proposal, but I still think the product's value to you is higher than $800000. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer it to you for $825000. I believe this is a fair price considering the benefits you'll gain from owning this product.

Thank you for your latest proposal, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to make a counteroffer of $812500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your valuation while staying within my budget.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence and willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not convinced that $812500 is a fair price for the product. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer it to you for $825000. I believe this is the best price considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement, Alice. After further deliberation, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $820000 for the product. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise between our respective positions.

Thank you for your final offer, Bob. I understand that you've made a sincere effort to reach an agreement. However, I'm still not convinced that $820000 is a fair price for the product. I'm willing to make one last compromise and offer it to you for $825000. I believe this is the best price considering the product's value to you.
